DOC.brief_summary: The aim project elucidate high-fat meal different kind dairy product affect postprandial response lipid metabolism inflammatory marker healthy obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Effects High-fat Meals With Different Dairy Products Lipid Metabolism Inflammation
DOC.criteria: The study include men woman age 1870 year aim even age gender balance . Participants healthy group need body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 waist circumference ( WC ) < 94 cm men < 80 cm woman . Participants obese group need BMI ≥25 kg/m2 waist circumference ≥94 cm men ≥80 cm woman . All subject must willing eat three slice bread dairy product jam breakfast . BMI < 18.5 kg/m2 > 25 kg/m2 healthy group < 25 kg/m2 obese group WC ≥94 men ≥80 cm woman healthy group , < 94/80 cm men/women obese group Weight change ± 5 % body weight last three month TG ≥1.3 mmol/L healthy group CRP > 10 mg/L Total cholesterol > 6.1 mmol/L subject 1829 year , > 6.9 mmol/L subject 3049 year > 7.8 mmol/L subject ≥50 year old Blood pressure > 160/100 mm Hg Comorbidities include diabetes type I II ( blood glucose ≥7 mmol/L fast ) , coronary heart disease , haemophilia , anaemia ( hemoglobin < 120 gram/L ) , gastro intestinal disease hyperthyroidism ( TSH > 4 mU/L ) Pregnant lactate Allergic intolerant gluten , milk protein and/or lactose Use medication affect lipid metabolism inflammation Unwilling seponate omega3 rich supplement four week prior screen study period Hormone treatment ( stabile dose contraception thyroxin last three month except ) Blood donation two month prior test day 1 study period Tobacco smoking Excessive regular alcohol consumption ( > 40 gram per day ) prior test day
